name: The Little Match Girl 2: Annus Evertens
name_original: The Little Match Girl 2: Annus Evertens
description:
One year after The Little Match Girl, by Hans Christian Andersen, the little match girl is hired to "take care of" (i.e. assassinate) a disgusting old man.

The Little Match Girl series of games is rated T for Teen.

(Scrollbars are disabled because they cause weird input problems in itch's iframe. The version here has scrolling if you like to scroll up and down.)
